title: Danny Romero (singer)
summary:
Daniel Ramírez Romero (Spanish: [daˈnjel raˈmiɾez roˈmeɾo]; born 21 May 1995), known professionally as Danny Romero, is a Spanish singer, songwriter, and producer. Born in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain. He began his career as a DJ after releasing "Agáchate" in 2012, his first single and one of his greatest successes, which reached number 42 on Spanish music charts. A year later, he had his first top 20 hit single "Motívate". His first album 11:11 was released in 2018.
Romero's musical style has been described as always with Latin dance music as a reference, but it is different and unpredictable, ranging from Latin house to urban sounds, such as reggaeton and hip hop.
